description.narrative: This activity (BEEP - Private Sector Policy Facility) is a component of Business Enabling Environment Programme - Private Sector Led Growth reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £2,041,998. This component benefits Ghana, and works in the following sector(s): Domestic revenue mobilisation, Business Policy and Administration, Trade policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Coffey International Development, DAI Europe, IMC Worldwide. The start date is 01-01-2015 and the end date is 31-12-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
